author: Bruce Osborne
subject: OhayoCon Rocked My World - :)
body:
Well, OhayoCon was a bitch-load of fun. Awesome for a first year 
convention, anyways, here is all the lupin shit I got:

Little Lupin gun that shoots him out of clothes and tries to get on Fujiko, 
interesting gadget.

Little model thing where lupin is dressed in black tossing a rope above a 
brick wall with a little watch tower.

Some lupin/jigen/car thing which I have no idea what the hell it does.

A lupin doll.

I think that's it. Plus I met a girl who liked Lupin, so that was cool, but 
didn't really get to talk to her, just tried to tell her about my site. 
Anyways, I need sleep, after no sleep the whole weekend it's what I need 
*class calls at 7AM*.

------------------------------------------------------
Bruce Osborne
